name: Whyd-shuffle
body:
Whyd Shuffle Bookmarklet

By Thomas Eustache

How to use

  1. Drag&drop this link to the bookmarks bar of your browser.
  2. go to a whyd playlist, ex: this one
  3. wait a few seconds for the tracks to re-order...
  4. hit the play button, and rediscover your playlist in a different order! :-)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
